title: 'Hidden Gem' in Netflix-Warner is Ad Team: Mark Douglas
description: Mark Douglas, MNTN CEO, says CNN can’t stand on its own and hopes it finds a new home, adding that it doesn’t make sense for Netflix to enter that space. He tells “The Close” that he hopes Netflix uses its resources to take franchises like Game of Thrones and The White Lotus even further. (Source: Bloomberg)
